quote: **Gravel bike or 29'er mtb. Ride what you are comfortable with!** If you are on a gravel bike I would suggest **nothing less than 700-40c**

Flagstaff is pretty nice in August. But at 7,000 ft **sun screen will be key**. While on course you may experience our **infamous monsoons**, so maybe a light rain jacket but often temperatures are pleasant and rain may feel good.
The course will be fully marked with large green and yellow signs at every turn and questionable intersections. Full GPS maps are available.
DON'T BE A JERK. You know what that means. Don't cheat, cut the course, punch the guy next to you in the finish line chute, yelling at volunteers etc. This is supposed to fun remember!
We will not be offering refunds or comp'd entries for the next year of any kind.
